""Powerful show of U.S. support for Ukraine as @ChrisCoons and @SenRobPortman met @ZelenskyyUA to reinforce the steadfast commitment of the American people. ""

""The tireless work of 🇺🇦 railway workers helps keep Ukraine running. I have so much respect for your service, and thank you for all you do to support those who support Ukraine. #ThankYouIronmen #RailwaymansDay #UkraineOnTheRails ""

"""From HIMARS to air defense, medical supplies to teacher salaries, when we say that the United States will provide Ukraine security, economic, and humanitarian support for as long as it takes, we mean it." - @StateEUR Assistant Secretary Karen Donfried. ""

""2/2. National Security Advisor Sullivan reinforced what President Biden has underscored: the United States and the American people stand with Ukraine, and we will stand with you for as long as it takes. ""

""1/2. Great to welcome National Security Advisor @jakesullivan46 to Kyiv to announce additional U.S. security assistance, including air defense, as Russia's strikes target Ukraine’s electricity and heating infrastructure. ""

""As @USAmbUN told @zelenskyyua, U.S. support for Ukraine will continue as we work together to bolster Ukraine’s grid, keep Ukrainian grain moving to those who need it, and hold Russia accountable for the atrocities and war crimes committed in Ukraine. ""
""Great for us and great for Ukraine to have @asstsecenr Pyatt leading efforts to coordinate U.S. energy support for Ukraine with international partners. ""
""Great to meet Howard Buffett, a strong supporter of Ukraine and a generous donor of humanitarian assistance to help the people of Ukraine as they grapple with the impact of Russia's brutal war. ""
""As we recognize the service and sacrifice of our country's veterans today, we honor those who have given so much in the fight for freedom and democracy across the world. ""

""Thanks to tireless efforts from our Ukrainian and international partners, @USAID-supported relief supplies and humanitarian assistance are already in Kherson. Proud to support the brave people in liberated areas who have withstood so much and now, again, live free. ""

""Important sanctions against a transnational network supporting Russia's war effort. We will continue to use sanctions and export controls to choke off the revenue it needs for its brutal war in Ukraine.""

""Another round of cruel attacks - thinking of our colleagues, neighbors, and friends here in Kyiv and across Ukraine. We will continue to stand with Ukrainians who have stayed strong in the face of Russia’s needless onslaught for months - and with those fighting to defend Ukraine.""

""On the evening of Russia's biggest missile attack since it started the war on Feb 24, I was proud to gather with @ChamberUkraine members to demonstrate support in the fight to help Ukraine prevail. Their contributions are key to Ukraine's economic resilience and reconstruction. ""

""Even as Ukraine sends grain to those who need it, Russia targets civilian infrastructure with more strikes across Ukraine, trying to leave millions in the cold and dark. Ukraine has every right to defend itself, and we will continue to stand with you.""

""Extending the Black Sea Grain Initiative will contribute to reduced prices and ensure desperately-needed food from Ukraine can feed the world. We will continue to support helping grain from Ukraine to reach global markets, particularly countries in facing severe food insecurity.""

""From defending Ukraine with the latest technology to digitizing public services to eliminate corruption, @FedorovMykhailo and @mintsyfra inspire us and lead Ukraine into the future. And our partnership is expanding with more @USAID support. ""

""Proud that the United States through @USAID will provide up to $20 million to support @ZelenskyyUa's “Grain from Ukraine” initiative. Together with @WFP, this initiative will get additional food to those countries most in need.""
""We join Ukraine in demanding accountability amid more evidence of torture, disappearances, and death under Russia's occupation in Kherson. ""

""On the Day of Freedom and Dignity, we honor the courage and vision of the Ukrainian people who took to the streets and stood together to defend Ukraine's European future and your continuing, valiant defense of your right to choose and define Ukraine's destiny. ""

""Heroic Ukrainians in occupied areas risk torture and death to keep faith in liberation alive. On Ukraine's Day of Dignity & Freedom, @chefjoseandres and I wear a #YellowRibbon to honor their bravery and determination – and to support a future Ukraine chooses for itself. ""

""As Russia continues its brutal war with attacks across the country, the United States through @USAID announced $4.5 bln more in support to help Ukraine keep schools, hospitals, emergency services, and utilities working for the people of Ukraine. ""

""More cruel missile strikes across the country as Russia tries to punish Ukraine for daring to be free. I have seen the strength of the people of Ukraine, and I know Russia’s attempt to dominate Ukraine by plunging it into the cold and dark will fail. We stand with Ukraine.""

""As Ukraine faces relentless attacks on its energy infrastructure, the United States will provide $400 million more in security assistance - arms, munitions, and air defense equipment - calibrated to serve Ukraine’s unbroken defenders in the face of Russia’s continued onslaught.""

""This Thanksgiving, even in the midst of darkness and loss, we choose to find the light. I am grateful for the strength of the Ukrainian people, the ferocity of Ukraine’s defenders, the trust of our partners and friends, and the commitment of my team here in Kyiv.""

""To support @Ukrzaliznytsia’s warm rooms, @USAIDSavesLives donated 22,500 blankets, and more are on the way. Russia’s cruel attacks against civilians make it all the more important that we all work around the clock to help Ukraine weather the cold this winter in every way we can. ""

"".@POTUS: This month, we remember the victims of the Holodomor. Even as the brave Ukrainian people continue to defend their democracy & freedom from Russia’s brutal aggression, we pause to honor the victims of past injustices & horrors inflicted on Ukraine.""

""Wonderful to welcome @UnderSecStateP Nuland back to Kyiv at this critical moment. Such a powerful voice for our partnership and for Ukraine's free future – and its importance to all of us. ""

""As Russia targets heat, water, and electricity for every person in Ukraine, including children and the elderly, we will continue to provide air defense against Russia's barbaric escalation and energy assistance to help Ukraine protect and repair civilian infrastructure. ""

""Thank you @ZelenskyyUa for our meeting this weekend and for sharing your vision. You have rallied Ukraine and inspired the world by embodying the bravery and resolve of the Ukrainian people. As I said on Saturday, America is proud to stand with Ukraine for as long as it takes.""

""As @POTUS said, 🇺🇸 and 🇺🇦 share the exact same vision of a free, independent, prosperous, and secure Ukraine. That’s reflected in the involvement of top officials at yesterday’s White House meeting, and in the breadth and depth of US support for 🇺🇦 and the Ukrainian people. ""
""As @POTUS stated, 🇺🇸 will give 🇺🇦 whatever it needs to defend itself and succeed on the battlefield. ""

""Moving to see 🇺🇦 flag signed by soldiers from Bakhmut in Congress yesterday. @ZelenskyyUA reminded us 🇺🇦 is not just fighting for territory. This is a struggle to define the world our kids and grandkids will live in, a battle for democracy. It can’t be ignored or postponed. ""

""Lucky to work so closely with my sister ambassador - and close and valued partner - @OMarkarova, Ukraine’s Ambassador to the U.S. Supporting @ZelenskyyUa ’s  visit to Washington, including the White House meeting between our two Presidents, was a great team effort. ""

""We at @USEmbassyKyiv - from @StateDept, @USAIDUkraine, Dept of @ENERGY, and @DeptofDefense - are proud to carry out @SecState’s mission to work day and night with Ukrainian partners to help keep the energy grid up and running through the winter. We stand with Ukraine.""

""Happy New Year from the 🇺🇸 Embassy team to the people of 🇺🇦.  Your resilience in the face of Russia’s brutal, unprovoked, and unjustified war has inspired the world.  As @POTUS said, 🇺🇸 will be with 🇺🇦 for as long as it takes. ""

""Good discussion with @Denys_Shmyhal on how the United States can help strengthen Ukraine’s energy sector now and for the future. As we move fast to help Ukraine withstand Russia’s attacks, we also support Ukraine’s vision of a secure, transparent, and competitive energy sector. ""

""Good meeting with OP Deputy Head Smyrnov to discuss next steps on judicial reform following the appointment of 8 judges to the High Council of Justice. Justice Sector reforms are critical to ensuring rule of law for all, attracting business, and Ukraine's Euro-Atlantic future. ""

""Great to meet with @DmytroKuleba to look at how we can build on @ZelenskyyUa's historic trip to Washington, continue military, economic, energy, and humanitarian support for Ukraine, and pursue accountability for Russia's aggression. ""

""Russia continues its desperate assault on Ukraine’s cities and people this afternoon. This is exactly why we prioritized support to Ukraine’s expert air defenders and keep working in lockstep to deliver what Ukraine needs on the battlefield and across the country.""
""Horrifying. My thoughts are with those suffering and with those working so hard to help. More security assistance is coming to help Ukraine defend itself. ""
